ocean.question: I'm big and blue, and fish swim through. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐳 Big animals live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I move very slowly.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🏖️ I live near the beach.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 Some people think I'm really smart!
🎨 I can change colors.
👐 I have no bones.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with pointy teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I am a predator.
🌊 I have a fin on my back.
🎬 People are often scared of me in movies.

ocean.question: I’m a colorful fish that can hide in the coral. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I live in warm waters.
🏠 Coral reefs are my home
🤡 Some of us are orange and white.

ocean.question: I'm a giant sea creature that spouts water high. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
🌬️ I breathe air.
🎶 Some people say I sing!

ocean.question: I’m a sea creature with a hard, spiny body. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I have many arms.
🖐️ I am not a fish
⛱️ Sometimes people find me on the beach.

ocean.question: I am the shoreline between the water and the land. What am I?

hints.text: 👣 You can walk on me
🌊 The ocean waves touch me.
🏖️ Sometimes I am sandy, sometimes rocky.

ocean.question: I am a group of tiny living things that make their own food from the sun. Many animals depend on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a plant, but very small.
🌞 I need the sun.
🐳 Some very big animals eat me!

ocean.question: I am a strong, underwater current that moves warm water from the Gulf of Mexico to Europe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I affect the weather.
➡️ I am like a river in the ocean.
🗺️ I am very important for Europe's climate.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I like sweets, what am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and work with others.
🍬 I might be found at a picnic.
💪 I can lift things much heavier than myself.

bug.question: I can fly and have colorful wings. I start as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I like to drink nectar from flowers.
🌈 My wings have beautiful patterns.
🐛 I used to be a crawling insect that eats leaves.

bug.question: I am a small, red bug with black spots. People say I am lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am often found in gardens.
🔴 My shell is bright.
⚫ I have dots all over my body.

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. I have a stinger. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I collect nectar from flowers.
🐝 I buzz around.
💛 People like to eat the sweet food I make.

bug.question: I jump very high and am green. I like to eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am often found in fields.
🟢 I blend in with the grass.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.

bug.question: I build a web to catch my dinner. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I trap my food in a sticky creation.
🕷️ People are sometimes scared of me.
🚶 I have more legs than you do.

bug.question: I come out at night and buzz around lights. I can be annoying when I bite. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I like the darkness.
🩸 I drink blood.
🦟 I make a high-pitched sound when I fly near you.

bug.question: I light up at night. I have a light at my bottom. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I glow in the dark.
🌃 I am active when it's dark outside.
💡 People like to catch me and put me in jars.

bug.question: I am a long insect that looks like a stick. I can blend into tree branches. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I look like a part of a tree.
🌳 I am good at hiding.
🪵 My body is very slender.

bug.question: I am a bug that makes a loud buzzing sound and comes around every summer. I live underground for many years before I appear. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I love hot weather.
🎶 I make a very loud noise.
🌳 I spend most of my life underground.
